channel.title: !?!? help me plz i have 3 questions ?!?!
channel.description:
I have made myself admin/owner but no crown comes up...i compile serve and it says...
player.java:27:no symbol found variable: symbol gex317 location: class player
what do i do to make the crown appear? :confused:
and how do i change it so that i am the only person who can spawn items on my server...? :|
and how can i get inf run energy

item.title: !?!? help me plz i have 3 questions ?!?!
item.dc:creator: @carpcatcher carpcatcher
item.description:
@carpcatcher wrote:

Hi, went into text folder with my name and it doesnt have any playerrights in it, checked in other named folders and none of them have playerrights in them ?

:|[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 06:35:12 AM[/size][hr]ty dude done it…

item.title: !?!? help me plz i have 3 questions ?!?!
item.dc:creator: @solidrune solidrune
item.description:
@solidrune wrote:

You want to be admin? thats what your putting the line for?
just delete the whole line…save then go into characters folder…go into the text file which says your name and where it says playerrights = (a number)
changer the number to 3…
then save…then compile it then go on your server…you shoudnt see a crown but when u talk you wil have a crown before your name…
hope this helps.
good day![br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 05:50:55 AM[/size][hr]Oh and if u need a tut with pics for that i got msn you could contact me and ill make one here…just add me on msn:england-1966@hotmail.com << because i may not look in this thread unlesss i see you have posted back…k thanks and good day!
once again i hope my last post helped anyway.

Read full topic
